subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Essense Carson scored 18 points, Kia Vaughn had 15 points and 9 rebounds, and the Liberty beat the first-place Indiana Fever, 83-75.
snippet: Essense Carson scored 18 points, Kia Vaughn had 15 points and 9 rebounds, and the Liberty beat the first-place Indiana Fever, 83-75.
